creator: apache-bugs.a2@x25.pl
text: ProxyPassReverse does not rewrite Location headers starting with // (like Location: //domain.com/move-here). It works only for http:// or https:// but not //

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
You are correct, it does not,

https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986#section-3

Without the 'scheme:' prefix the Location is not a valid base URI, and cannot
be distinguished between a //machine and the resource //foo.

Therefore this behavior is by design.
